name: Chat perché
description:
Chat perché is inspired of the french game which is basically a play tag.

When you are a cat you need to catch toys and bring them to the safe zone.
When it is done you will earn a point.
When you are in the safe zone you are untouchable by the wolves.
In french version when you are in the safe zone you say "Chat perché".

As a wolf the game is simple, you try to catch cats.

The game was made for the AI and Game jam 2022.
I implemented the theme "Isolation" with safe zone.
When you are isolated, you are untouchable.

By the way, I'm Timothée and I made this game solo.
First time drawing sprites on my own, I'm pretty happy with the result for a first experience.
I was busy and I procrastinated a lot, sorry for not finishing it in the given time.

If I had more time I would have add more visual feedbacks, sounds, and music.

That's it, thanks for playing it !
